channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 New Tricks to Try With Google Gemini Live After Its Latest Major Upgrade
item.description: Google's AI is now even smarter, and more versatile.

item.title: The 32 top enterprise tech startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the enterprise tech Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: The Best Vacuum for Pet Hair—We Tested Many to Find Which Ones Work Best (2026)
item.description: Cordless, handheld, robot, and traditional—we tested them all to find the vacuum that’s fantastic for fur.

item.title: You’ve been targeted by government spyware. Now what?
item.description: Tech companies are increasingly warning their customers that they have been targeted by governments with advanced government spyware, such as NSO's Pe...

item.title: VCs predict strong enterprise AI adoption next year — again
item.description: More than 20 venture capitalists share their thoughts on AI agents, enterprise AI budgets and more for 2026.

item.title: How to use the new ChatGPT app integrations, including DoorDash, Spotify, Uber, and others
item.description: Learn how to use Spotify, Canva, Figma, Expedia, and other apps directly in ChatGPT.

item.title: The Best Body Pillow, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From the classic body pillow to unique shapes for optimal limb support, we tested a wide range of body pillows designed for side sleepers.

item.title: Samsung plans to bring Google Photos to its TVs in 2026
item.description: Samsung said that Memories features for Google Photos will be exclusive to its TVs for six months

item.title: The Worst Hacks of 2025
item.description: From university breaches to cyberattacks that shut down whole supply chains, these were the worst cybersecurity incidents of the year.

item.title: iMP Tech Mini Arcade Pro Review: A Nintendo Switch Arcade Cabinet
item.description: A fun diversion for retro gaming on the Nintendo Switch 2—if you can stand to look at it.
